release_notes: Added frontend screens for OTP verification and forgot password. Improved validation with password strength indicator.
features: Email OTP verification for new registrations
Frontend OTP verification screen with auto-submit
Smart error messages with context awareness
User profile management with photo upload
fixes: Duplicate email registration now returns HTTP 409 Conflict for better frontend handling
CRITICAL: Fixed remaining patient_notes references in patient detail screen - now uses clinical_notes
CRITICAL: Fixed app crash 'Cannot read property query of null' - added null safety check for database collection
Fixed database migration error on fresh installs - removed SQL copy from non-existent patient_notes table
Improved profile photo error handling - now shows actual error messages instead of generic 'Failed to pick image'
CRITICAL: Fixed notes sync - renamed frontend table patient_notes to clinical_notes to match backend
Added schema migration to v2 to preserve existing notes data
Fixed sync push 409 error: Empty email strings now converted to None
Convert string ID to MongoDB ObjectId() before querying database
Fixed user lookup to handle both _id (ObjectId) and id (UUID) fields
Fixed User import in security.py for sync operations
Added retry logic with exponential backoff
